text: What a rotten application of one's self!

text: It's just as well. I bet Roast Beef doesn't even own any dancin' pants.

text: Dancin' pants are the most vital part of a wardrobe besides a thong as Ray proves.

name: foea
text: huh.. the town next to where I live is also called Eudora. I wonder if it is also named after Eudora Welty.

name: solobuttons
text: I do worry about how Philippe will turn out sometimes.

name: cailetshadow
text: Philippe has learned something valuable about the world today.

name: qwerty
text: Today Philippe learned a lot about the internet.

name: nicolae
text: I like jerk-boys when I was younger.  Now?  Not so much.  Maybe I change, maybe they change, who knows?

name: mustakrakesh
text: Do you think the jerk-boys listen to 'girls on film' while strutting around for you?

name: spinynorman
text: Something about Philippe waking up is just absurdly adorable. This and the first edition of The Philippe Times are just so AWWWW inducing.

name: tellumo
text: I agree, although I think it's kinda remarkable that a strip containing the phrase "HUGE UNCUT ASIAN JERK-BOYS" could be described as "AWWWW-inducing."

name: spinynorman
text: Dancin' pants negates any Asian jerk-boys, uncut or not.

name: charchar
text: Perhaps they could enhance one another?

name: epicurus
text:
We've all had a moment like this, when we realized what the internet really is: A terrible place where nothing works.

Except by virtue of always being five, Philippe is going to be having a LOT of moments like this.

name: mattylite
text: DELIVERY FAILURE NOTICE reads the fourth, cut-off email. Nothing to say about it, just wanted to show off my eagle eye.

name: plasticthings
text: Mr. Bear is not the only fellow, i suppose

name: radarjammer
text: The good news is, if Beef is ever looking for some huge uncut asian boys to distract him from his bullet wound, Philipe can hook him up.

text:

text: ALIEN ASS

text:
Phillipe's first concern upon awakening is hooking up his friend with a nice lady.

He is truly rad.
